clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy of Huaiqihuang Granule in Children With Primary Nephrotic Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Real-world Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Huaiqihuang Granule in Children With Primary Nephrotic Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multisite, open-label, prospective and registered study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Huai-Qi-Huang granule in children with primary nephrotic syndrome.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multisite, open-label, prospective and registered study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Huai-Qi-Huang granule in children with primary nephrotic syndrome(PNS). The study will be Planned at 1500 participants, and subjects will be on study for up to one year. Data will be collected by authorized physicians for 48 weeks. all of the data included demographic characteristics, information about PNS, laboratory tests and adverse events.

primary_outcome.measure: Duration of positive urine protein test changing to the negative result
primary_outcome.description: Duration of positive urine protein test changing to the negative result was measured from day 1 until the time of positive urine protein test changing to negative, assessed up to 48 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: The ratio of positive to negative urine protein
primary_outcome.description: The proportion of negative urine protein subjects to the total number of subjects, measured from day 1 until the time of positive urine protein test changing to negative, assessed up to 48 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: The decrease of 24-hour urine protein level
primary_outcome.description: Compared 24-hour urine protein level between baseline and follow-up timepoint, measured from day 1 until time of positive urine protein test changing to negative, assessed up to 48 weeks.

secondary_outcome.description: Compared blood albumin levels between baseline and follow-up timepoint, assessed up to 48 weeks.
The proportion of recurrent subjects to the total number of subjects.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rates of infectious complications of PNS
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of complicated infectious subjects to the total number of subjects.

study_pop.textblock: Children are diagnosed with primary nephrotic syndrome
